summary: I was just testing. I found this AMAZING artist, Vindsvept, through Hodilton videos and had to use this song. I made it for myself, thought I would share. Replaces your main menu background and music.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]
[color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________


[b][color=#93c47d][size=6]:: Eli's Main Menu Replacer ::[/size][/color][/b][size=2]
[/size]
[size=2]Mod changes the background image and music for the Skyrim Main Menu
I was just testing.[/size] I found this AMAZING artist, Vindsvept, through [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoEjvAplB6GaVJjCAwx3fJA]Hodilton videos[/url] and had to use this song. 
I made it for myself, thought I would share. 

[youtube]hjaHBJ5scjg[/youtube]
I added the original screenshot to the download if you want to use it somewhere.

This was made on a 1920x1080 resolution, tested with 2 other resolutions (1280x720 & 1440x810). Should work. 
If you want to remove the fog, use the optional file in the download.

[b][color=#6aa84f][size=4]:: INSTALLATION ::
[/size][/color][/b]
Extract the rar and place Data folder to your .....\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim, merge and overwrite when prompted.
Or use NMM/other mod manager of choice. 

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]:: UNINSTALLATION ::

[/b][/size][/color]Remove files from
..\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data\meshes\interface\logo <- delete logo.nif
..\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data\Textures\interface\objects <- delete mainmenuwallpaper.dds
..\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data\Music\special <- delete mus_maintheme.xwm

[color=#38761d][b][size=4]:: CREDITS AND PERMISSIONS ::
[/size][/b]
[/color]Vindsvept music used under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 
Flying high on Youtube: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wnn1heiTDsU]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wnn1heiTDsU
[/url]
Vindsvept's website: [url=http://vindsvept.com/]http://vindsvept.com/[/url]
Use wherever you want, the song too, as long as you don't charge money for it and credit and link back to Vindsvept[/center]
author: Elianora
